rooms.description: Traditional Kerala style entrance with decorative carvings, ensuring Vastu compliance by aligning the entrance direction with positive energy flow.
Spacious living area adjoining the courtyard for natural light and ventilation, respecting local aesthetics and spatial harmony.
Separate dining space integrated with the living room for social interactions, following Vastu principles regarding food consumption areas.
Private master bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet; positioned in a north-east direction to enhance prosperity as per Vastu.
Additional bedroom designed for guest use, ensuring sufficient privacy and natural light.
Dedicated space for children located on the south side to maintain balance with other spaces as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Ornate wooden door designed in traditional Kerala style with motifs aligning to the auspicious east direction.
Large windows opening into the central courtyard ensuring cross ventilation and connection with nature.
Access to a small balcony providing external view and privacy while aligning with Vastu guidelines for relaxation areas.

levels.description: The ground floor layout features a central courtyard that serves as the focal point of natural light and ventilation, with well-defined spaces for living, dining, sleeping, and guest accommodation. The design adheres to Traditional Kerala architecture principles and integrates Vastu considerations for auspicious energy flow.
